txt.en:
[placeholder],

Your studies need attending. Return to me at the Scholar's Stair in Bree at once.

Dalton Willow

'It seems that you have reached another important milestone in your journey as a [placeholder], [placeholder].\n\n'You may have noticed that I have in my possession a number of books that may help you to become a better [placeholder]. Now that you are ready to read them, you should buy these books and learn what they have to teach you.'
You received a letter from your trainer in Bree-town asking for you to return to him. Apparently, there is something that he wishes to teach you.
Bring the letter to Dalton Willow in Bree
Dalton Willow sent you a letter requesting that you visit him in Bree.\n\nDeliver the letter to Dalton Willow. He can be found in the Scholar's Stair in Bree.
